Section.name: About GITAM School of Law
Section.description:
GITAM School of Law, Visakhapatnam offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the field of Law. Admission is done on the basis of GAT/CLAT/LSAT scores. Gandhi Institute of Technology and Management (GITAM), parent institute of GITAM School of Law, is ranked 67th in NIRF-2021 University Rankings. It is going to conduct GITAM GAT 2021 (Round 4) Exam to be held on July 27, apply till July 24. Check Here
Gitam School of Law has an academic autonomy with flexibility in the curriculum that suits the requirements of Corporate, Bench, and Bar. The interdisciplinary approach combined with lawyering skills is best suited for the changing global scenario. The school provides technically competent law graduates who will be able to handle the new legal complexities and the specializations offered would lead to cutting edge research in contemporary areas.

Ques. How can I get queries answered about GITAM School of Law?
Ans. You can contact the administration by visiting the official website and clicking the contact tab upon which you will be guided to the page containing contact information of principle or you can leave a message by entering your name, email and phone number.
Ques. What is the syllabus of the GAT conducted by the GITAM School of Technology?
Ans. The duration of the test is 2 hours. The test consists of three sections and all questions are of objective type (multiple choice questions). Each question has four options of which one is correct. Each correct answer will be awarded 2 marks. The wrong answer and unanswered questions will receive nil marks.
